item.text: Then Jesus said to the crowds and to his disciples,

“The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2523" class="">sit</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses’</st> <st data-num="2515" class="">seat</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="5083" class="">pay attention</st> to <st data-num="3767" class="">what</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> it. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> what <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="2041">do</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> they do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">practice</st> what they <st data-num="3004" class="">teach</st>.<n id="1" />

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1195">tie up</st> <st data-num="926" class="">heavy</st> <st data-num="5413" class="">loads</st>, <st data-num="1419" class="">hard to carry</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2007" class="">put</st> them <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="444">men’s</st> <st data-num="5606" class="">shoulders</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="846" class="">themselves</st> are <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">willing</st> even to lift a <st data-num="1147" class="">finger</st> to <st data-num="2795" class="">move</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> be <st data-num="2300" class="">seen</st> by <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> they make <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="5440" class="">phylacteries</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4115" class="">wide</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> their <st data-num="2899" class="">tassels</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3170" class="">long</st>.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5368" class="">love</st> the <st data-num="4411">place of honor</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="1173" class="">banquets</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4410">best seats</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogues</st><n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="783">elaborate greetings</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="58" class="">marketplaces</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to have <st data-num="444" class="">people</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">call</st> them ‘<st data-num="4461">Rabbi</st>.’

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to be <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> ‘<st data-num="4461">Rabbi</st>,’ <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1320" class="">Teacher</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">call</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> one <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> ‘<st data-num="3962" class="">father</st>’ <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, who is in <st data-num="3770" class="">heaven</st>.

<st data-num="3366" class="">Nor</st> are you to be <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> ‘<st data-num="2519" class="">teacher</st>,’ <st data-num="3754">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2519">Teacher</st>, the <st data-num="5547">Christ</st>.<n id="1" />

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3187" class="">greatest</st> among <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1249" class="">servant</st>.
And whoever exalts himself will be humbled, and whoever humbles himself will be exalted.
“But woe to you, experts in the law and you Pharisees, hypocrites! You keep locking people out of the kingdom of heaven! For you neither enter nor permit those trying to enter to go in.
“Woe to you, experts in the law and you Pharisees, hypocrites! You cross land and sea to make one convert, and when you get one, you make him twice as much a child of hell as yourselves!
“Woe to you, blind guides, who say, ‘Whoever swears by the temple is bound by nothing. But whoever swears by the gold of the temple is bound by the oath.’

<st data-num="5185" class="">Blind</st> <st data-num="3474" class="">fools</st>! <st data-num="5101" class="">Which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3187" class="">greater</st>, the <st data-num="5557" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> that <st data-num="37">makes</st> the <st data-num="5557" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="37" class="">sacred</st>?

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st>, ‘<st data-num="3739">Whoever</st> <st data-num="3660" class="">swears</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2379" class="">altar</st> is bound by <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> if <st data-num="3739">anyone</st> <st data-num="3660" class="">swears</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="1435" class="">gift</st> <st data-num="1883" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> he is <st data-num="3784" class="">bound</st> by the oath.’

You are <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>! <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">which</st> is <st data-num="3173" class="">greater</st>, the <st data-num="1435" class="">gift</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="2379" class="">altar</st> that <st data-num="37">makes</st> the <st data-num="1435" class="">gift</st> <st data-num="37" class="">sacred</st>?

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3588">whoever</st> <st data-num="3660" class="">swears</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2379" class="">altar</st> <st data-num="3660" class="">swears</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="1883" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3588">whoever</st> <st data-num="3660" class="">swears</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="3660" class="">swears</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the one who <st data-num="2730" class="">dwells</st> in <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.
And whoever swears by heaven swears by the throne of God and the one who sits on it.

“Woe to you, experts in the law and you Pharisees, hypocrites! You give a tenth of mint, dill, and cumin, yet you neglect what is more important in the law—justice, mercy, and faithfulness! You should have done these things without neglecting the others.
Blind guides! You strain out a gnat yet swallow a camel!
“Woe to you, experts in the law and you Pharisees, hypocrites! You clean the outside of the cup and the dish, but inside they are full of greed and self-indulgence.
Blind Pharisee! First clean the inside of the cup, so that the outside may become clean too!

“Woe to you, experts in the law and you Pharisees, hypocrites! You are like whitewashed tombs that look beautiful on the outside but inside are full of the bones of the dead and of everything unclean.
In the same way, on the outside you look righteous to people, but inside you are full of hypocrisy and lawlessness.
“Woe to you, experts in the law and you Pharisees, hypocrites! You build tombs for the prophets and decorate the graves of the righteous.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> you <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1487">If</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">we</st> had lived <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">we</st> would <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> have <st data-num="2844" class="">participated</st> with <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="129">shedding the blood</st> of the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets.’</st>

<st data-num="5620">By saying this</st> you <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st> against <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">descendants</st> of those who <st data-num="5407" class="">murdered</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>.

<st data-num="4137">Fill up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">then</st> the <st data-num="3358" class="">measure</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st>!
You snakes, you offspring of vipers! How will you escape being condemned to hell?
“For this reason I am sending you prophets and wise men and experts in the law, some of whom you will kill and crucify, and some you will flog in your synagogues and pursue from town to town,

<st data-num="3704">so that</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="1632" class="">shed</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>, <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st> <st data-num="6" class="">Abel</st> to the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of <st data-num="2197" class="">Zechariah</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="914" class="">Barachiah</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> you <st data-num="5407" class="">murdered</st> <st data-num="3342" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2379" class="">altar</st>.
I tell you the truth, this generation will be held responsible for all these things!

“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, you who kill the prophets and stone those who are sent to you! How often I have longed to gather your children together as a hen gathers her chicks under her wings, but you would have none of it!

<st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> is <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2048">desolate</st>!
For I tell you, you will not see me from now until you say, ‘Blessed is the one who comes in the name of the Lord!’”
